statements: SELECT * FROM electronic_discovery;
SELECT case_name, client_name FROM electronic_discovery WHERE case_type = 'Litigation';
SELECT * FROM electronic_discovery WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT case_id, case_type FROM electronic_discovery WHERE client_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT case_name, client_name, case_type, case_status FROM electronic_discovery ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, case_name, case_type FROM electronic_discovery;
SELECT * FROM electronic_discovery WHERE case_status='Open';
SELECT case_name, client_name FROM electronic_discovery WHERE case_type='Litigation' ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM electronic_discovery;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM electronic_discovery WHERE case_status='Closed';
SELECT * FROM Cases;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM Cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM Cases ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Documents WHERE case_id = 2;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM Documents WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Cases
SELECT * FROM Cases WHERE case_id = 1
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM Cases ORDER BY case_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT case_name FROM Cases ORDER BY case_id ASC
SELECT Cases.case_name, Documents.document_name FROM Cases INNER JOIN Documents ON Cases.case_id = Documents.case_id
SELECT * FROM electronic_discovery_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_date FROM electronic_discovery_processes ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM document_review WHERE review_status = 'Pending';
SELECT process_name, end_date, status FROM electronic_discovery_processes WHERE status = 'InProgress';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_specialization FROM reviewer;
SELECT * FROM electronic_discovery_processes;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM electronic_discovery_processes WHERE status = 'InProgress';
SELECT process_id, process_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM electronic_discovery_processes WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, review_status, review_date FROM document_review WHERE review_status = 'Pending';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_specialization, review_history FROM reviewer ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM review_tasks ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM review_tasks WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Report' ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM documents WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM documents ORDER BY document_type ASC, upload_date DESC;
SELECT d.document_name, r.result FROM documents d JOIN review_tasks t ON d.document_id = t.assigned_to JOIN review_results r ON t.task_id = r.task_id WHERE r.result = 'Approved';
SELECT u.user_name, t.task_name, r.review_date FROM users u JOIN review_results r ON u.user_id = r.reviewer_id JOIN review_tasks t ON r.task_id = t.task_id ORDER BY r.review_date DESC;
SELECT id, case_name, case_type FROM ElectronicDiscovery;
SELECT case_name, case_number, case_description FROM ElectronicDiscovery ORDER BY case_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM DocumentReview WHERE review_status='Completed';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date FROM ReviewComments WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM ReviewTasks WHERE completed = FALSE ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ElectronicDiscovery WHERE case_number = 12345
SELECT document_name, document_type, review_status FROM DocumentReview ORDER BY document_type DESC
SELECT reviewer_id, review_date FROM ReviewComments WHERE reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT attachment_name, file_size, upload_date FROM FileAttachments WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date ASC
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, due_date, completed FROM ReviewTasks WHERE completed = FALSE
